docs.snippet: If your idea of Brazil is beaches and bikinis, São Paulo is not the place to go. That's what Rio de Janeiro is for.

docs.snippet: A former army colonel who acknowledged he tortured and killed political prisoners during Brazil's 1964-1985 military regime was murdered in his home outside Rio de Janeiro, police told local news media on Saturday.
